content.question: Given the curve <math alttext="y times 2 to the y power, equals x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> in the <math alttext="x y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-plane, for what value of <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, if any, does the derivative of <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> with respect to <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> not exist?

choices.label: <math alttext="y equals, the negative of the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator the natural log of 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
For no value of <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="y equals, the negative of the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator the natural log of 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
